content.html:
Get Ready to Dive Into the Adventure! ü•ØüßÅ



Dive into the early stages of our game by clicking on the download link to download the Beta version. Your feedback can shape the future of this exciting world!

Movement: Use WASD keys to move up, left, down, and right, respectively.

Detached The Head Press Left Mouse click to detach from your body and regenerate in a specific area and to explode the body üí•.
content.markdown:
# Get Ready to Dive Into the Adventure! ü•ØüßÅ

Dive into the early stages of our game by clicking on the download link to download the Beta version. Your feedback can shape the future of this exciting world!
Movement: Use WASD keys to move up, left, down, and right, respectively.

Detached The Head Press Left Mouse click to detach from your body and regenerate in a specific area and to explode the body üí•.

en.heading: You Are Invited to Try Our Beta Version! üôå

content.html:
For players about to explore the Beta version of our game, here's a list of known bugs we're actively working on:


  1. Gameplay Mechanics: We're refining key gameplay elements to ensure every puzzle and challenge is engaging and functions as intended.

  2. Visual & Audio Immersion: Enhancements in particle effects, background music, and sound effects are being implemented to deepen your immersion into the world of Unbreaded.

  3. Player Interaction: Improvements to obstacles, UI, and player controls are in progress to provide a seamless and intuitive gameplay experience.

  4. Controller Support: We're working on features like automatic pause on controller disconnect and dynamic button glyphs to accommodate a wide range of controller models, aiming for a universally smooth experience across devices.


    We appreciate your patience and feedback as we work through these issues. Your insights are invaluable in helping us refine and enhance the game. Thank you for being a part of our development journey!
content.markdown:
For players about to explore the Beta version of our game, here's a list of known bugs we're actively working on: 1.
**Gameplay Mechanics:** We're refining key gameplay elements to ensure every puzzle and challenge is engaging and functions as intended.
2. **Visual & Audio Immersion:** Enhancements in particle effects, background music, and sound effects are being implemented to deepen your immersion into the world of Unbreaded.
3. **Player Interaction:** Improvements to obstacles, UI, and player controls are in progress to provide a seamless and intuitive gameplay experience.
4. **Controller Support:** We're working on features like automatic pause on controller disconnect and dynamic button glyphs to accommodate a wide range of controller models, aiming for a universally smooth experience across devices.

---
We appreciate your patience and feedback as we work through these issues. Your insights are invaluable in helping us refine and enhance the game. Thank you for being a part of our development journey!

content.html:
Get Ready to Dive Into the Adventure! ü•ØüßÅ



Dive into the early stages of our game by clicking on the download link to download the alpha version. Your feedback can shape the future of this exciting world!

Movement: Use WASD keys to move up, left, down, and right, respectively.

Transform Abilities: Press F to detach from your body and regenerate in a specific area.
content.markdown:
# Get Ready to Dive Into the Adventure! ü•ØüßÅ

Dive into the early stages of our game by clicking on the download link to download the alpha version. Your feedback can shape the future of this exciting world!

Movement: Use WASD keys to move up, left, down, and right, respectively.

Transform Abilities: Press F to detach from your body and regenerate in a specific area.

en.heading: You Are Invited to Try Our Alpha Version! üôå

content.html:
For players about to explore the Alpha version of our game, here's a list of known bugs we're actively working on:

  1. Jump Mechanics: We're fine-tuning our jump function to make it more responsive and are exploring the addition of a custom jump feature to enhance navigation and gameplay fluidity.

    Coyote Time: Our team is implementing "Coyote Time" to allow for a more forgiving and enjoyable platforming experience, ensuring that missed jumps by a hair's breadth don't lead to undue frustration.

    Visual Glitches: In certain areas, such as near the cashier, character models may disappear unexpectedly. This is a known bug that we're aiming to fix as soon as possible.

    Camera Behavior: We've identified issues where the camera may clip through objects like rotating tables, potentially disrupting your immersion. We are working diligently to correct these camera issues to ensure a seamless exploration of our world.


    We appreciate your patience and feedback as we work through these issues. Your insights are invaluable in helping us refine and enhance the game. Thank you for being a part of our development journey!
content.markdown:
For players about to explore the Alpha version of our game, here's a list of known bugs we're actively working on: 1. **Jump Mechanics:** We're fine-tuning our jump function to make it more responsive and are exploring the addition of a custom jump feature to enhance navigation and gameplay fluidity.
**Coyote Time**: Our team is implementing "Coyote Time" to allow for a more forgiving and enjoyable platforming experience, ensuring that missed jumps by a hair's breadth don't lead to undue frustration.
**Visual Glitches**: In certain areas, such as near the cashier, character models may disappear unexpectedly. This is a known bug that we're aiming to fix as soon as possible.
**Camera Behavior**: We've identified issues where the camera may clip through objects like rotating tables, potentially disrupting your immersion. We are working diligently to correct these camera issues to ensure a seamless exploration of our world.

---
We appreciate your patience and feedback as we work through these issues. Your insights are invaluable in helping us refine and enhance the game. Thank you for being a part of our development journey!

code.html:
ABOUT US

"Unbreaded" springs from a small, passionate team of indie developers, bonded over a shared love for meaningful narratives and innovative gameplay.

Inspired by the charm of artisan baking and its resilience, our game crafts a story around the struggle against the encroachment of impersonal industrialization. The development journey has been one of creativity, collaboration, and dedication to bringing our vision to life.

"Unbreaded" is more than a game to us; it's a heartfelt tribute to tradition, craft, and the enduring spirit of those who create with passion.
SEND US A MESSAGE

OUR TEAM

{#each teams as team}
{#each team.members as {profile_img, name, title, linkedin, link}}

{name}

{title}

{/each}
{/each}

E-MAIL

dor@unbreadedgame.com

LINKEDIN

linkedin.com/company/unbreaded/

Instagram

unbreadedgame

TWITTER

unbreadedGame

CONTACT US

We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have feedback on Unbreaded, need support, or want to connect with us for press inquiries, here's how you can reach out

Copyright 2024

{#each social as { link, icon }} {/each}

FEATURES

{#each features_0 as { icon, title, description }}

{title}

{description}

{/each}

features_0.description: Dive into a richly woven story where every puzzle solved and battle won unfolds more of the gingerbread man's quest against industrialization.

features_0.description: Engage with interactive puzzles that cleverly utilize the bakery setting, demanding creativity and strategic thinking.

features_0.title: Combat Mechanics
features_0.description: Experience unique combat that leverages baking tools and ingredients, offering a fresh twist on strategy and action.

features_0.title: Dynamic Environments

code.html: "Unbreaded" is an engaging game where a gingerbread man, created with care by a passionate chef, fights against a corporation aiming to industrialize his artisan bakery. Set in a transformed bakery, players navigate puzzles, combat animated appliances, and explore themes of tradition versus modernization. This concise narrative invites gamers into a battle for the heart of baking, blending rich storytelling with strategic gameplay to defend the essence of artisan craftsmanship.

content.html:
heading 1

Overall, our calendar software is the perfect tool for managing your time and staying organized. With its user-friendly interface and powerful search functionality, it's the ideal solution for anyone looking to take control of their schedule and make the most of their time.

heading 2

Additionally, our software integrates seamlessly with popular email services,

so that users can easily invite others and receive updates about events.

heading 3

Try it out today and see the difference for yourself. Overall, our calendar software is a comprehensive and effective tool for managing your time.

Some interesting quote info
content.markdown:
# heading 1

Overall, our calendar software is the *perfect tool* for managing your time and staying organized. With its user-friendly interface and powerful search functionality, it's the ideal solution for anyone looking to take control of their schedule and make the most of their time.

## heading 2

Additionally, our software integrates seamlessly with <mark>popular email services,</mark>

 so that users can easily invite others and receive updates about events.

### heading 3

Try it out today and see the difference for yourself. Overall, our calendar software is a comprehensive and effective tool for managing your time.

> Some interesting quote info

en.heading: Contact Us
en.subheading: Whether you have questions, feedback, or just want to say hello, we're always ready to hear from you. Please fill out the contact form, and we'll do our best to respond within 24-48 hours.

content.html: Our calendar software company was founded with the goal of helping people better manage their time and stay organized. We recognized that many people struggle to keep track of their busy schedules, and we wanted to provide a simple and effective solution. With our calendar software, we've created an easy-to-use tool that allows users to quickly add and view events, set reminders, and invite others to events. We've also made sure to integrate seamlessly with popular email services, so that users can easily stay connected with their colleagues and friends.

code.html: {@html content.html}

content.html:
Join us on our mission

Through awareness, education, and direct action, we're working to combat climate change and protect our precious ecosystems. Together, we can make a difference.

Since our founding, we've been at the forefront of environmental conservation. Our dedicated team of scientists, activists, and volunteers works tirelessly to protect endangered species, restore critical habitats, and educate the public about the urgency of climate action.
